vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to be white
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) to make white, become white, purify
1a2) to show whiteness, grow white
1b) (Hithpael) to become white, be purified (ethical)
§ 1) to be white
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) to make white, become white, purify
1a2) to show whiteness, grow white
1b) (Hithpael) to become white, be purified (ethical)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 白
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) 使潔白, 變白, 使潔淨
1a2) 顯示潔白, 長白
1b) (Hithpael) 被潔淨 (倫理的) (但12:10)
2) (Qal) 作磚
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 白
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) 使洁白, 变白, 使洁净
1a2) 显示洁白, 长白
1b) (Hithpael) 被洁净 (伦理的) (但12:10)
2) (Qal) 作砖

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
(Qal) to make bricks
§ (Qal) to make bricks
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   hacer ladrillos; (b) hitp.   mostrarse, aparecer blanco; (c) hif.   blanquearse
